SELECT a.id id, a.voucher_no voucherNo, a.inside_order insideOrder, a.custom_no customNo, e.custom_name customName, a.order_no orderNo, a.order_source orderSourceId, b.voucher_date voucherDate, b.first_date firstDate, d.org_name orgName, d.id orgId, b.status status, c.is_finished isFinished, b.id podd_id, b.prod_no podd_prodNo, b.amount podd_amount, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(amount),0) FROM delivery_detail_crm WHERE voucher_no = #{voucherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) podd_okAmount, g.prod_name podd_prodName FROM PRODUCE_ORDER_APS a LEFT JOIN PRODUCE_ORDER_DETAIL_APS b ON a.voucher_no = b.voucher_no and a.company_id = b.company_id and b.DELETED = 'F' LEFT JOIN VOUCHER_MAIN_OA c ON a.voucher_no = c.voucher_no a.company_id = c.company_id and c.deleted = 'F' LEFT JOIN hcm.CAS_ORG d ON a.org_id = d.id and a.company_id = d.company_id and d.deleted = 'F' LEFT JOIN crm.customs_crm e ON e.custom_no = a.custom_no and e.company_id = a.company_id and e.deleted = 'F' LEFT JOIN DELIVERY_DETAIL_CRM f on f.voucher_no = a.voucher_no and f.company_id = a.company_id and f.deleted = 'F' LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_STORE_PLM g on g.prod_no = b.prod_no and g.DELETED = 'F' and g.company_id = b.company_id WHERE a.voucher_no = #{voucherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.DELETED = 'F' AND a.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
